label: uncl4237
comment: Code specifying the arrangements for a payment.

values.label: Payable elsewhere
values.comment: Responsibility for payment of transport charges unknown at time of departure.

values.label: Third party to pay
values.comment: A third party to pay the freight bill is known at the time of shipment.

values.label: Collect
values.comment: Charges are (to be) collected from the consignee at the destination.

values.label: Prepaid
values.comment: Charges are (to be) prepaid before the transport actually leaves.
